Description.Text:
Position Surrounded by green Mediterranean vegetation and a picturesque vineyard, the hotel is located in the most striking and tranquil area of Ischia, where the beautiful views of the Citara bay and Mount Epomeo can be enjoyed.
Restaurant The chef of the restaurant in the hotel Il Gattopardo awaits you with his delicious surprises: starting from a rich breakfast buffet to the traditional Neapolitan recipes. For your relax moments the hotel offers you two bars: one indoor and another outside on the sunny terrace.
Outside
Lobby
More Informations The Hotel Il Gattopardo is provided with five pools (three outside and two inside).
The outdoor pools, that are embedded in a lush Mediterranean garden with solarium, deck chairs and beach umbrellas, include: a Kneipp pool with hot and cold water basins, a pool with thermal water and a swimming pool with hydromassages, which is also equipped for counter-current swimming. Besides, the hotel is fully equipped with facilities for the disabled.
